title: Verify Pro cancellation within 12 hours of shift start
preconditions: Pro is logged in and has a booked shift. The current time is less than 12 hours before the shift start time.

steps.step_text: Navigate to the booked shifts section and select the shift to cancel.
Initiate the cancellation process for the selected shift.
steps.step_expected: A confirmation modal appears, indicating the penalty and providing a link to the updated policy.

steps.step_text: Observe the text within the cancellation confirmation modal.
steps.step_expected: The modal text clearly states: "You can cancel up to 12 hours before start without penalty." and mentions the reliability score reduction for cancellations less than 12 hours before the shift.

steps.step_text: Verify that the help center link in the modal navigates to the new policy document detailing the 12-hour cancellation window.
steps.step_expected: The help center link successfully redirects to the updated policy document.
